Text.Page:
Wendigos aren't brutes, not by a long shot. They command magic as we do, that's what makes them so dangerous.

I want you to hunt down their {@LinkCreature:34#510#wendigo frostweavers} and {@LinkCreature:34#500#frostmages}, and collect their foci.
Splendid. Without their foci, the wendigos magical might is greatly diminished, as is their threat.

It isn't enough to kill wendigos if you leave the foci around to be used by a different wendigo.

Kill the frostmages and frostweavers and collect their magical foci.
